subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Curt Schilling has not pitched on the regular four days of rest for any of his three playoff starts, but he will in Game 2 against the Colorado Rockies on Thursday night.
snippet: Curt Schilling has not pitched on the regular four days of rest for any of his three playoff starts, but he will in Game 2 against the Colorado Rockies on Thursday night.
